Text: VERITAS CORDIALLY INVITES YOU TO OUR EXECUTIVE EVENT US OPEN CH AMPIONSHIP usopenhousejpg usopengolfergif usopenheadergif usopenclearspacergif usopenlogogif Paul A Sallaberry Executive Vice President Worldwide Field Operations at VERITAS cordially invites you to be our guest at the US Open Championship Watch the worlds best golfers compete for the most coveted title on the tour at the historic Southern Hills Country Club in Tulsa Oklahoma VERITAS has arranged especially for you some of the most exquisite dining experiences available featuring unique culinary delights found only in Tulsa In addition to full hospitality in an airconditioned tent next to the Admission Gate VERITAS will provide Hospitality tent at a private facility with a panoramic view of the th green and th fairway Airline Ticket to and from the event Transportation to and from the airport Accommodations for two nights Breakfast Luncheon Dinner Daily pairing sheets official programs and daily newspaper Outdoor patio area with umbrella tables Fully stocked open bar Tickets to the event Shuttle service tofrom the entrance gate minute trip Complimentary golf lessons from a teaching professional Complimentary golf simulatorvirtual golf Tee times This invitation is nontransferable Limited spots are available Please RSVP as soon as possible to mailto Please contact Cindy Bailey if you have questions or require additional information Travel and accommodations must be arranged through VERITAS travel service by June Please reserve at time of RSVP Subject to Availability Agenda Friday June th Evening arrivalcheck in Dinner Saturday June th Day three of the US Open Breakfast Available Tee times Luncheon Hors doeuvrescocktails Dinner Sunday June th Final Day of the US Open Breakfast Luncheon Hors doeuvrescocktails Depart for home housejpg golfergif headergif clearspacergif logogif
